Controller

app.controller('appController', () ->
  $scope.account = null
  $scope.configuration =
    creatorToken:
      description: 'user@keboola.com'
    created: '2014-11-19T11:25:34+0100'
)
Page Content
  • Menu Item

View

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-9">
    Page Content
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-3">
    <ul class="nav nav-stacked">
      <li><a>
        <i class="fa fa-plus fa-fw"></i>
        Menu Item
      </a></li>
    </ul>
    <kb-extractor-info
      configuration="configuration"
      authorized-for="account.username"
    ></kb-extractor-info>
  </div>
</div>

Controller

app.controller('appController', () ->
  $scope.account =
    username: 'customer@crm.com'
  $scope.configuration =
    creatorToken:
      description: 'user@keboola.com'
    created: '2014-11-19T11:25:34+0100'
)
